name: places/ChIJA659tq9ZwokRYGislfc4KN0
formattedAddress: 49 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 49 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Josh is wonderful.  I came to him trying to wean off of Ambien and he helped me so much.  We did 6 sessions and now I am sleeping so much better with no drugs.  I struggled with insomnia for 20 years.   He really helped me understand sleep from a place of calm and the CBTi process really works at normalizing sleep and restructuring my thinking around sleep.  It works - I just had to stick with it and trust.  Recommend highly!

text.text: Josh is wonderful.  I came to him trying to wean off of Ambien and he helped me so much.  We did 6 sessions and now I am sleeping so much better with no drugs.  I struggled with insomnia for 20 years.   He really helped me understand sleep from a place of calm and the CBTi process really works at normalizing sleep and restructuring my thinking around sleep.  It works - I just had to stick with it and trust.  Recommend highly!

originalText.text: I didn't find Dr. Tal's program worked for me.  He is more of a coach.  He tried to challenge my notions of sleeping, and he tried to push when I went to bed to crazy late times, which did not help my insomnia.  We discussed a few aspects of sleep, most of which you can read in "Why We Sleep"  Very useful reading if you are having issues with sleep.  In the end I saw a dr who can prescribe, and then I was able to taper off the prescription to nothing, and I can now fall asleep naturally and stay asleep.  Sleep is a lot about what you believe you can do, and what you believe are your limitations.  For me, I was able to identify my  anxiety and now I am much better

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Tal for treating sleep disorders- my personal experience is with night terrors and sleep walking.  I had never sought any type of therapy before, and was lucky to find Dr. Tal as my first psychologist. We spent 6 months meeting via telemedicine trying various methods for understanding the trauma affecting my sleep. I am happy to say that since working with Dr. Tal, not only has my sleep walking ceased, but I was able to identify and process trauma that I didn't realize impacted my life in such a heavy way.  I am forever grateful for Dr. Tal's kindness, patience and his ability to intertwine helping and humor. My treatment experience was overwhelmingly positive and I hope if you are in the fence, this review will help you feel more confident in choosing Dr. Tal to help you too!

originalText.text: I had some serious Insomnia issues and thought there was no way out. No medication/technique has worked in the past so I know I needed to try something different. Dr. Josh Tal was extremely helpful and his technique was great. I am much more confident and happy about my sleep. Highly suggest seeing him if you are experiencing insomnia.

Dr. Josh Tal was extremely helpful and his technique was great. I am much more confident and happy about my sleep. Highly suggest seeing him if you are experiencing insomnia.

originalText.text: Dr. Tal truly helped me get my life back. Everyday I thank god how he guided me to him and had gotten me to this place in my life. I don’t want to go too much into detail about myself because this review is obviously public, but he helped me get off of the medication I was on and deal with and learn how to cope with my sleep anxiety. I was skeptical about the price but honestly, he is worth every single penny. Thank you Dr.Tal for everything you have done for me.
